title: Battle Box
briefDescription: A remake of Battle Box from MCC (Minecraft Championship) into a Bedrock Version you and your friends can play on! If you don't know whats ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A remake of Battle Box from MCC (Minecraft Championship) into a Bedrock Version you and your friends can play on! If you don?t know whats Battle Box, it?s a 4 vs 4 minigame where which team have to fill in the middle with 9 wool of their color. They can also kill each other, be aware of that.
I have added tons of commands to prevent cheating in any possible way, so you don?t have to worry about a lot of arguments of intentional game design when a team unfairly wins.
How to Play: You will be put into a lobby where you can choose which team to join, it can be 4v4, 1v1, 1v4, etc.
You should be put into another room once you have chosen a team. Once you and everybody have chosen a team, click ?Start Game.?

After you have clicked ?Start Game,? you should be in the map selector room where you choose a map to play on. For now there is one, I am trying my best to make the most unique maps apart from all, hope you understand.

title: Push The Button! [Minigame] [Multiplayer]
briefDescription: Welcome to Push The Button!This fun and addictive game are compatible with up to 5 players! So far there are 2 AWESOME game modes!1. Push The ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This fun and addictive game are compatible with up to 5 players! So far there are 2 AWESOME game modes!
1. Push The Button: 3 Players. 2. Shoot the button: 3-5 Players.
Push The Button is a duel-like game mode where two players face up against each other to be the first person to push their shiny button in front of them!
Shoot The Button is a CRAZY party game where up to 4 players battle it out to be the first person to shoot the button in front of them.
Both game modes include one host. the host controls the games and when the games start! its fun for all and your bound to have a great time!

title: Invasion
briefDescription: Today is your check for new job. Show your best and get a job at the your dreams research center! Get new friends or save ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Today is your check for new job. Show your best and get a job at the your dreams research center! Get new friends or save from save the whole world from strange mind-control alien, or maybe you will unleash him?
By making this map i tried show all capabilities of NPC mobs from Minecraft Education Edition
You think that it is best work for you because it is not far from home?
?and you?ll get the real cake, that not lie!

Could you get this job, or you?ll be inadmissible for this?
The research center offers you several tests, for example:
Coordination test
Accuracy Test
Jumping test

And more, that you could see by yourself
You are allowed to walk around the closed to the public places of the center, and check technical rooms.

title: Ftere?s Non Geometry Map
briefDescription: Old:This is my first map please don't judge me. I play on mcpe 1.16.0.58 and it works. I have used the warped buttons and signs....

crawledImageUrls.text:
Old:
This is my first map please don?t judge me. I play on mcpe 1.16.0.58 and it works. I have used the warped buttons and signs.
It is created with command blocks, ask me if you want a tutorial.
I created a little room full of strange things. Will you discover them all?
New
It works fine for me in 1.16.100, but it should work on older versions too?
Write in comments what I should add.
In my version addons that adds blocks doesn?t work and the map Is totally functional without any resource pack.
In the map you will try to escape from a strange laboratory where you are imprisoned, good luck!

this is the start, the map for now is very small but I will update it often.
Please leave credits, and, if you wont, you can make a video and post it on YouTube.
In this map were used much command blocks for create: an infinite loop, a teleporting door, an unlimited succession of rooms, a flat staircase, another teleporting door (compressed)? I will add more in future. If you like it support me. In the 0.0.3 update I added the red version: everything will have a red theme. In the 0.0.4 I added a big part of the map and a little bit lore! For now, there isn?t an ending! ? But I will add it soon! In this map you will find a building of quartz, that I will expand in every update. ?Actually you start in an area where there are three rooms, if you go left you will see the ending but not how to reach it, of you go into the second room you will be teleported in the first. You will enter in a room with a glass floor and go down. There are a lot of features that you can discover. I excuse me, but for add a lore i created a troll. There is only one jump and it?s impossible! I hope you like it, enjoy. I added a Little part of the map, where you should click a lever ti open the path.
Hello, it?s me again. I played with Dragekk a lot and made a complete remake of the map, using the clone command and not the tp one I hope you will enjoy the new map.

title: Lily?s Mystery: Finding Sophie Chapter 2 (Horror)
briefDescription: We will continue the story of the father who lost his daughter inside Lily's House (your daughter's bestfriend)Requirements: TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN YOUR ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
We will continue the story of the father who lost his daughter inside Lily?s House (your daughter?s bestfriend)
Requirements: TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN YOUR ROOM!
And This map is not recommended for those person who has a heart problems
This map contains loud noises and jumpscares that not suitable for those person who has a heart problem.
Note: I recommend to turn off the lights in your room because most of the rooms in this map has a limited amount of light source.
You can also play this map with your friend but the maximum player is 2 you cannot play this map with 3 or more players or the game will crash or it will not work properly.
This map needs a lot of patience, for some people it will be hard to finish this map but dont give up cause everything has solution on our problem! Just try to figure it out!
+ How to play?
? Collect and read books to find what?s your next move
? Find keys to unlock locked doors (some doors/gates doesn?t need keys to be unlock, they have buttons or lever to be open! )
? Dont commit suicide!
+ Requirements:
? MCBE ver 1.16.x +
? A strong device (lower device is not tested yet)
? Turn off the lights in your room
? Brightness ? 90%-100%
? Volume ? [Youre Choice!]
? Time and Patience
+ Notes:
? Do not take any items from the armor stands
? Do not kill armor stands
? Dont give your items on armor stands
? Never Commit suicide
? Reading Books can lead you for your next move!
? Never leave your partner alone!
? There are different types of potions! 2 throwable and 1 drinkable they also have different amount of healing effects
+ How to play in Multiplayer?
? First click the ?Teleport all players here? button from the lobby
? Second click the ?Choose Character? button from the lobby to select character
? The first one who will click the button will be the player 1
? And the second player who will click the button will be the player 2

Note: Your player character(s) will depend on your xp level or experience level! Level 1 is player 1 and Level 2 is player 2 if theres some problem on choosing character you can reply on the comment box below! And also do not start the game if the other player is not yet ready
Screenshots:

title: The Snake Game
briefDescription: Remember that classic snake game form back in the Nokia glory days. Well now you can play that game inside of Minecraft!! It was done ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Remember that classic snake game form back in the Nokia glory days. Well now you can play that game inside of Minecraft!! It was done with just a few simple commands and a bit of time.

The Snake Game, a true classic. I have a lot fond memories about this simple yet challenging game and so I made it in Minecraft!
For anyone who is unaware of exactly what this game is, well it?s quite simple. You control a snake. You move around and have to eat food, but for each bite your body gets longer. When you crash head first into a wall, or your tail, it?s game over.

The controls are pretty snappy and responsive. You can control the direction of the snake by moving you player in the direction that you want the snake?s head to go (forwards, backwards, left and right)

title: The Great Bedrock Wall Abseil
briefDescription: This is a map that tests your block clutching skills. You have to abseil down walls of different heights. There are 10 levels, ranging from easy ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is a map that tests your block clutching skills. You have to abseil down walls of different heights. There are 10 levels, ranging from easy to hard. I?m sure you will love this map. It is made by me and InhaledBoat7944 (my friend) also we have lots of vegetation and trees! #teamtrees
The walls get higher as you go along, with the highest one being at the top of the world. We added plants and trees for aesthetics, and no clutching on them.

title: Roblox Noob Defense [PvE/Minigame] (Gamemode Update!)
briefDescription: A strange force of mobs calling themselves 'noobs' have come to minecraft! No one quite knows what the noobs are doing in minecraft or why ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A strange force of mobs calling themselves ?noobs? have come to minecraft! No one quite knows what the noobs are doing in minecraft or why they came to begin with, all we know is that they aren?t friendly. Perhaps they came here by mistake?? Anyways, it?s up to you to defend fort Minecraft from the noob invasion!
The latest version updates the gameplay with a new perk system, a new crossbowman class, new noobs, and more!
This map was inspired by similar games on the platform ?roblox? such as Guest Defense.
Armies of noobs will spawn overtime, depending on which gamemode is chosen.
Last long enough, and a Boss Noob will spawn! Each gamemode has its own unique boss!
